>Construction of pLYC16
acquire oligo ZH15			
acquire oligo ZH15R
acquire oligo ZH2
acquire oligo ZH2R
acquire oligo ZH16
acquire oligo ZH16R
acquire plasmid pLYC10
acquire genomic_dna MG1655_ispG
PCR ZH15,ZH2R on pLYC10	(4376 bp, pcrA16)
PCR ZH2,ZH16R on pLYC10	(3949 bp, pcrB16)
PCR ZH16,ZH15R on MG1655_ispG (1195 bp, pcrC16)
Assemble pcrA16,pcrB16,pcrC16	(Gibson, pLYC16)
Transform pLYC16	(Mach1, Amp)
